--- layout: default nav: attributes > ic-history-elt ---

ic-history-elt - The History Element

Summary

The ic-history-elt attribute tells intercooler the element to take a snapshot of when storing history entries, as well as the element to restore history snapshots into.

Typically this attribute is placed on an element that is present on every page in your web application, so it is always possible to restore history.

Syntax

The value of this attribute should always be true

Dependencies

No effect.
